programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: NewPointofView
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: The rudest crab that ever was
programme.desc: The twins give a grumpy Crab a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: The very good witch
programme.desc: The twins meet a little witch who has no friends because everyone is afraid of her.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Thunderstorm
programme.desc: The twins help a girl to overcome her fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: Eggface Revenge
programme.desc: Brains brilliance at mathematics helps her to win a prize, but also the jealousy of Egghead, a brainy space villain.

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: Let's Go Camping~
programme.desc: Friends are camping today. Sitting around the campfire, they decide to grill some sausages. Scot goes to look for them in their hiding place, but theyre not there! Friends believe that Scot is up to his old tricks and has hidden them for himself. They remind him of the last time he hid food... and it turns out that it was the same day the gang met Duda for the first time. Admitting that he wasnt the one eating the snacks he had hidden then, Scot begins to tell his friends what really happened that day. And it looks like a cute little mole that lives underground may have been the unwitting culprit.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: King Pancake
programme.desc: PANCAKE wishes he could be king so that he alone could tell everyone else what to do – only to learn that being in charge isn’t as easy as it looks. Both leaders and helpers are needed to finish any job. Giving orders and taking orders are both important to get a job done.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the "Sneezils flu," all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: The Cup Final – Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: Liudmila tiene 40 años, está separada y se la pasa soñando con tener una apasionada aventura.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: El aburrido matrimonio de Román se termina cuando él se enamora de una modelo webcam en una página de porno.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: ¿Por qué una relación llena de alegría y pasión deja de funcionar? Es lo que se preguntan Bodán y Olesia.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: Un astrónomo debe elegir entre la mujer que ama y las estrellas que estudia desde su observatorio.

programme.title: Los Farsantes
programme.desc: Para impresionar a la familia de su novia, Misha contrata actores para que finjan ser sus papás.

programme.title: Los Farsantes
programme.desc: Para impresionar a la familia de su novia, Misha contrata actores para que finjan ser sus papás.

programme.title: Mamá al acecho
programme.desc: El bebé de Elizabeth es secuestrado y ella no se detendrá ante nada para encontrarlo.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Banat Al Aam
programme.desc: Director: Ahmed Samer Farag - Cast: Ahmed Fahmy - Sheko - Hesham Maged - Year of production:2012

programme.title: Andaleeb El Dokki
programme.desc: Director: Wael Ehsan - Cast: Mohamed Henedy / Heba Nour - Year of production: 2007

programme.title: Al limbi 8 Gega
programme.desc: Director: Ashraf Faek - Cast: Mohamed Saad / Mai Ez El Din - Year of production: 2010

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Budhi Diwali
programme.desc: It is Documentary film of 20 Minutes based on the Celebration of a Traditional festival of Budhi Diwali. This festival is organised in the villages of remote areas of Shillai and Sangrah Tehsils of Sirmour District in Himachal Pradesh in North India. Though Diwali festival has its roots in the Ramayana when lord Ram returned to Ayodya from exile (Banwas). But, Budhi Diwali celebration is connected with returning of Lord Ram, people don't agree with this.

programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: The Arctic Giant- 1942
programme.desc: Superman versus a thawed-out Tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Secret Agent 1943
programme.desc: Superman battles saboteurs determined to stop a lady double agent from getting important documents to Washington D.C.

programme.title: There's Good Boos Tonight 1948
programme.desc: Casper makes friends with a fox cub. But the new friendship is threatened when a fox hunter and his two hounds come on the scene.

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939
programme.desc: Betty Boop and Pudgy, doing the spring planting, are plagued by crows.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Road to Bali 1952
programme.desc: Two unemployed show-biz pals accept treasure-diving work in Bali for a local princess and they find treasure, love and trouble

programme.title: The Admiral Was a Lady 1950
programme.desc: Ex-WAVE encounters four fun-loving, work-hating men, all of whom want to marry her.

programme.title: Bliss- 1917
programme.desc: A counterfeit count is aided in his courtship of the heroine by her father who is overwhelmed by his 'title.'

programme.title: The Property Man 1916
programme.desc: Charlie has trouble with actors' luggage and conflicts over who gets the star's dressing room. There are further difficulties with frequent scene changes, wrong entries and a fireman's hose. At one point he juggles an athlete's supposed weights. The humor is still rough: he kicks an older assistant in the face and allows him to be run over by a truck

programme.title: The Lucy Show; Season 5; Episode 17; Main Street U.S.A.
programme.desc: Mr. Mooney and Lucy travel to a quaint small town to loan the mayor money to build a highway right down Main Street. When they arrive, they are greeted with intense opposition and Lucy decides to join the anti-highway townspeople fight the new road.

programme.title: Recreation-1914
programme.desc: Charlie is walking in the park. A girl leaves a seaman on one bench and joins Charlie on another. The seaman wakes up. He and Charlie stage a brick fight. Policemen get hit and arrest both men. During an ensuing fight on the dock the policemen, the seaman, Charlie and the girl wind up in the water

programme.title: High Society-1924
programme.desc: Mickey is taken away from his Uncle Pat to live with his wealthy Aunt Kate. Mickey's new life as a rich kid proves to be an unhappy one until Uncle Pat and the gang pay a visit one afternoon.

programme.title: Neath Brooklyn Bridge-1942
programme.desc: The East Side Kids uncover the body of a murder victim, but must protect the innocent girl accused of the crime

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!

programme.title: Guest Eternal Polk
programme.desc: When your family is facing a crisis, sometimes it's hard to think past your own situation. Heirs' property issues and the potential loss of family land is like that. I feels like "just a me problem". Land loss is very personal; especially when it's your family's heritage. Unfortunately, heirs' property is far too common and the toll that it is taking on Black family structures is in a word, devastating. By now, you might have seen or heard about the documentary, Silver Dollar Road. If you haven't, watch it. In this episode, here's the personal and painful side of the heirs' property story, from one of the family members who's family has been dealing with for years.

programme.title: The Bread Is In Your Hands
programme.desc: In “The Bread Is In Your Hands,” Pastor Holly Furtick teaches us that having compassion is less about signing up to serve and more about serving those who are right in front of us.

programme.title: The Pajamas Are A Prophecy
programme.desc: In “The Pajamas Are A Prophecy,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us of God’s promises to reach us where we are, wrap us with His care, and raise us to life.

programme.title: Think Like A Reaper
programme.desc: In “Think Like A Reaper,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to think about the outcome while living in the fear, frustration, and fatigue of right now. You’ll be encouraged that God is with you in your hard place, and help is closer than you realize.

programme.title: This Is What A Miracle Feels Like
programme.desc: Sometimes, a miracle feels like you’re free, but you’re still running. Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us to look for signs that God is at work when our feelings haven’t caught up to our reality in “This Is What A Miracle Feels Like.”

programme.title: All You've Got To Do Is Don't
programme.desc: We all find ourselves in seasons when we feel like we don’t have what it takes, and we don’t know what to do. But don’t be afraid or discouraged, because God isn’t late — He’s working according to His timing. Don’t lose hope, and don’t give up
